titles.title: Not What I Am, O Lord

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Not what I am, O Lord, but what Thou art, that, that alone can be my soul’s true rest; Thy love, not mine, bids fear and doubt depart, and stills the tempest of my throbbing breast.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Girt with the love of God on ev'ry side, breathing that love as heav’ns own healing air, I work or wait, still following my Guide, braving each foe, escaping ev'ry snare.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: ’Tis what I know of Thee, my Lord and God, that fills my soul with peace, my lips with song: Thou art my Health, my Joy, my Staff and Rod; leaning on Thee, in weakness I am strong.

verse.name: v5
